alert.note: Alert for Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 4:02PM EDT until July 05 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Washington County in southeastern Maine... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 402 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Meddybemps, or near Calais, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Calais, Perry, Pembroke, Meddybemps, Baileyville, Robbinston, Alexander, Dennysville, Charlotte, Baring, Cooper, Edmunds and Marion. This includes US Highway 1 between Dennysville and Pembroke. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
